Title: Mathilukal
Actors: Mammootty, Thilakan, Karamana Janardanan Nair, Murali
Plot: Confined to the narrow space of a prison cell, Bashir falls in love with a woman in the neighbouring prison compound. They are separated by a high wall so that they never see each other and have to devise ingenious ways for communicating. Narayani, Bashir's love is presented as a female voice and never appears in person in the film..
